analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/19/0x55675e0d2551a34c2e3c68fa83b5108527957fdd.sol:
	Contract IST34Token has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/19/0x55675e0d2551a34c2e3c68fa83b5108527957fdd.sol#394-396)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/19/0x55675e0d2551a34c2e3c68fa83b5108527957fdd.sol#154-156) is not in mixedCase
